INPATIENT.benefitName: Allowable Consumables And / Or Enteral Feedings
Uterine Artery Embolization And Hifu (High Intensity Focused Ultrasound)
Vaporisation Of The Prostrate (Green Laser Treatment Or Holmium Laser Treatment)
Pre Hospitalization Medical Expenses For Organ Donor
Post Hospitalization Medical Expenses For Organ Donor
Medical Expenses Of The Organ Donor
Transplant Of Any Organ Or Tissue (Experimental)
Expense Related To Organ Transportation Or Preservation
Treatment To The Donor As A Consequence Of Harvesting
Any Services For People Who Are Terminally Ill To Address Physical, Social, Emotional And Spiritual Needs.
Treatment For Alcoholism, Drug & Addictive Condition
Services As Spas Or Similar Establishments
Rmo Charges,Surcharges And Service Charges Levied By The Hospital
Food Charges (Other Than Patient'S Diet Provided By Hospital)
Blood Grouping And Cross Matching Of Donors Samples
Service Charges Where Nursing Charge Also Charged
Extra Diet Of Patient (Other Than That Which Forms Part Of Bed Charge)
Oxygen Cylinder (For Usage Outside The Hospital)
Nimbus Bed Or Water Or Air Bed Charges
Private Nurses Charges- Special Nursing Charges
Creams Powders Lotions (Toiletries Are Not Payable,Only Prescribed Medical Pharmaceuticals Payable)
Any Kit With No Details Mentioned [Delivery Kit,Orthokit, Recovery Kit, Etc]
Documentation Charges / Administrative Expenses / Discharge Procedure Charges
Expenses Related To Prescription On Discharge
Blood Reservation Charges And Ante Natal Booking Charges
Nutrition Planning Charges - Dietician Charges- Diet Charges
All Internal Or External Benign Or In Situ Neoplasms/Tumours, Cyst, Sinus, Polyp, Nodules, Swelling, Mass Or Lump
Mastoid (Including Otitis Media, Cholesteatoma, Perforation Of Tympanic Membrane)
Genito-Urinary System Unless Necessitated By Malignancy
